text: Is there a way to accept input from more than one mouse separately?

I'm interested in making a multi-user application and I thought it would be great if I could have 2 or more users holding wireless mice each interacting with the app individually with a separate mouse arrow.
Is this something I should try to farm out to some other application/driver/os_magic?
or is there a library I can use to accomplish this?
Language isn't a HUGE deal, but C, C++, and Python are preferrable.

Found this multi-pointer toolkit for linux (it's actually a multi-pointer x server):
http://wearables.unisa.edu.au/mpx/
